member.name: T:Evalr.API.Models.EvaluateRequest
member.summary: Request to evaluate a mathematical or boolean expression.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.EvaluateRequest.Variables
member.summary: Optional dictionary of variable values. Key: variable name, Value: numeric value.

member.name: T:Evalr.API.Models.EvaluateResponse
member.summary: Response containing the evaluation result.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.EvaluateResponse.Value
member.summary: The computed numerical result. For boolean expressions: 0.0 = false, 1.0 = true.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.EvaluateResponse.DisplayValue
member.summary: Human-readable string representation of the result. For boolean expressions, returns "true" or "false".

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.EvaluateResponse.IsBooleanExpression
member.summary: Indicates if this was a boolean expression.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.EvaluateResponse.Variables
member.summary: The variables that were used in the evaluation.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.EvaluateResponse.Expression
member.summary: The original expression that was evaluated.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.EvaluateResponse.PostfixNotation
member.summary: The expression in postfix (Reverse Polish) notation. Useful for debugging and educational purposes.

member.name: T:Evalr.API.Models.ExtractVariablesRequest
member.summary: Request to extract variable names from an expression.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.ExtractVariablesRequest.Expression
member.summary: The expression to analyze for variables.

member.name: T:Evalr.API.Models.ExtractVariablesResponse
member.summary: Response containing extracted variable names.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.ExtractVariablesResponse.Variables
member.summary: List of variable names found in the expression.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.ExtractVariablesResponse.Expression
member.summary: The original expression that was analyzed.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.ExtractVariablesResponse.HasVariables
member.summary: Indicates if the expression contains any variables.

member.name: T:Evalr.API.Models.ErrorResponse
member.summary: Standard error response for all API endpoints.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.ErrorResponse.Error
member.summary: Error type/category (e.g., "ValidationError", "EvaluationError").

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.ErrorResponse.Message
member.summary: Detailed error message.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.ErrorResponse.Expression
member.summary: The expression that caused the error (if applicable).

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.ErrorResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: HTTP status code.

member.name: T:Evalr.API.Models.HealthResponse
member.summary: Health check

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.HealthResponse.Status
member.summary: Service status (e.g., "healthy", "degraded", "unhealthy").

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.HealthResponse.Version
member.summary: Service version (from assembly).

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.HealthResponse.Timestamp
member.summary: Current timestamp.

member.name: P:Evalr.API.Models.HealthResponse.Checks
member.summary: Optional details about what was checked.
